items.sentence: Why didn\'t you try the dress on before you bought it?
Tom is by far the best singer performing at this club.
Tom washed the dishes even though no one asked him to.
Tom will come back from Boston this week or next week.
Tom\'s parents told him not to get involved with Mary.
You look as though you\'ve just lost your best friend.
Tom and I didn\'t speak to each other for three years.
Tom and I have started to get on each other\'s nerves.
Tom burst out laughing when he saw Mary dancing a jig.
Tom can hardly fit into the jeans he bought last year.
